Sentence.sentence: There appeared more and more Roman-style buildings.

Sentence.sentence: In other words, it appears that minds give out before their bodies do.

Sentence.sentence: Even seemingly harmless details on a resume, it appears, can tap into recruiters' biases.

Sentence.sentence: Asking juicy questions appears to be a transferable skill for deepening collaborative inquiry into the science content found in exhibits.

Sentence.sentence: On the surface,Sweden appears to be a feminist paradise.

Sentence.sentence: However, a further increase in farming area without impacting unfavourably on what remains of the world's natural ecosystems appears unlikely.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Just connect via videoconferencing software, so your face appears on Ava's screen.

Sentence.sentence: That's partially because it appears people who set realistic goals actually work more efficiently, and exert more effort, to achieve those goals.

Sentence.sentence: That conclusion was reinforced by another finding: that their opposition appeared to soften when that fiscal burden decreased, as occurred with welfare reform in the 1990s, which curbed immigrants' access to certain benefits.

Sentence.sentence: In a study that will appear in the Journal of Experimental Social Psychology, Plant's team tested 229 students during the height of the Obama fever.

Sentence.sentence: This exploitation has reached such extremes that presently it appears that some hundreds of thousands of species will be extinguished before the end of the century.

Sentence.sentence: Three-quarters of the world's flamingos fly over from other salt lakes in the Rift Valley and nest on salt-crystal islands that appear when the water is at a specific level一too high and the birds can't build their nests, too low and predators can move bri
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"看起来，好像是"之意。
means: appear ：指从感观印象看似乎是如此，但有时着重指因视野、观点限制而产生的歪曲印象。
look ：指从样子看起来，侧重通过视觉而建立的印象。
seem ：多指从主观印象或个反应得出的看法。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"出现"之意。
means: loom ：指朦胧出现，好像从雾中浮现出来一样。

stems_affixes.word_buile: disappear消失+ance性质→n.不见, 消失 v.与……同等 n.同等的人

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+pear看见;出现→看见了→出现了
disappear消失+ance性质→n.不见, 消失 v.与……同等 n.同等的人
peer=pear看见;出现→凝视, 窥视→同等的人→与……同等

entry.def: If you say that something appears to be the way you describe it, you are reporting what you believe or what you have been told, though you cannot be sure it is true.

example.ex: There appears to be increasing support for the leadership to take a more aggressive stance...
example.tran: 好像有越来越多的人支持领导层采取更为强势的立场。

example.ex: The aircraft appears to have crashed near Katmandu...
example.tran: 飞机似乎在加德满都附近坠毁了。

entry.def: If someone or something appears to have a particular quality or characteristic, they give the impression of having that quality or characteristic.

example.ex: She did her best to appear more self-assured than she felt...
example.tran: 她竭力让自己表现得比实际更自信。

example.ex: He is anxious to appear a gentleman...
example.tran: 他急于想表现得像个绅士。

entry.def: When someone or something appears, they move into a position where you can see them.

example.ex: A woman appeared at the far end of the street...
example.tran: 一个女人远远出现在街的尽头。

example.ex: Last night some of the prisoners appeared on the roof.
example.tran: 昨晚，其中几个犯人出现在房顶上。

entry.def: When something new appears, it begins to exist or reaches a stage of development where its existence can be noticed.

example.ex: ...small white flowers which appear in early summer...
example.tran: 初夏时绽放的白色小花

example.ex: Slogans have appeared on walls around the city.
example.tran: 标语已出现在全城周围的墙上。

entry.def: When something such as a book appears, it is published or becomes available for people to buy.

example.ex: I could hardly wait for 'Boys' World' to appear each month.
example.tran: 每个月我都翘首期盼着《男孩世界》的出版。

example.ex: ...a poem which appeared in his last collection of verse.
example.tran: 发表在他最后一部诗集中的一首诗

entry.def: When someone appears in something such as a play, a show, or a television programme, they take part in it.

example.ex: Jill Bennett became John Osborne's fourth wife, and appeared in several of his plays...
example.tran: 吉尔·本内特成为了约翰·奥斯本的第四任妻子，并参演过他的几部戏剧。

example.ex: Student leaders appeared on television to ask for calm.
example.tran: 学生领袖出现在电视上请求大家保持冷静。

entry.def: When someone appears before a court of law or before an official committee, they go there in order to answer charges or to give information as a witness.

example.ex: Two other executives appeared at Worthing Magistrates' Court charged with tax fraud...
example.tran: 又有两个经理因偷税漏税指控被传唤到沃辛治安法庭。

example.ex: The American will appear before members of the disciplinary committee at Portman Square.
example.tran: 那个美国人将在波特曼广场接受纪律委员会成员的审问。

means.word_mean: 1. give a certain impression or have a certain outward aspect;

sentences.sentence: "This appears to be a very difficult problem"
"They appeared like people who had not eaten or slept for a long time"
"A new star appeared on the horizon"
"The new Woody Allen film hasn't come out yet"

means.word_mean: 4. seem to be true, probable, or apparent;

sentences.sentence: "It seems that he is very gifted"
"It appears that the weather in California is very bad"

means.word_mean: 5. come into being or existence, or appear on the scene;

sentences.sentence: "Then the computer came along and changed our lives"
"Homo sapiens appeared millions of years ago"

means.word_mean: 6. appear as a character on stage or appear in a play, etc.;

sentences.sentence: "She appeared in `Hamlet' on the London stage"

means.word_mean: 7. present oneself formally, as before a (judicial) authority;

sentences.sentence: "He had to appear in court last month"
"She appeared on several charges of theft"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French apareir, from Latin apparere, from ad- 'towards' + parere 'come into view'

sentences.cn: 但是，几乎所有的食品零售商都忽视了自家后院的一个庞大的盈利机会，即食品和饮料的批发贸易。而这似乎正是零售商们需要的市场。

sentences.cn: 竞争法似乎是解决这些权利不平衡问题的唯一途径。
sentences.en: Competition law appears to be the only way to address these imbalances of power.

sentences.cn: 即便是简历上看起来无伤大雅的细节似乎都会引起招聘者的偏见。
sentences.en: Even seemingly harmless details on a resume, it appears, can tap into recruiters ’ biases.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 问有料的问题似乎是在展览活动中发现的能够深化科学领域协作探究的一个通用技巧。
sentences.en: Asking  juicy questions appears to be a transferable skill for deepening  collaborative inquiry into the science content found in exhibits.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 池塘中的污染物似乎来自暴风鹱在海上捕食的鱼。
sentences.en: The pollutants in  the  ponds  appear  to  come  from fish  that  fulmars  eat  when  they’re out on the ocean

sentences.cn: 换言之，思维似乎比身体早一步精疲力竭。
sentences.en: In  other words,  it  appears  that  minds  give  out before their bodies do

sentences.cn: 据该部门的副?主管Jessica Verfuss 称，?被困矿工似乎都未受伤。
sentences.en: And they all appear to be uninjured, said Jessica Verfuss, the emergency department’s Assistant Director.

sentences.cn: 但金砖四国中落单的似乎是中国, 而非俄罗斯.
sentences.en: But China, not Russia, appears to be the odd Bric out.

sentences.cn: 他似乎要赢.
sentences.en: It appears as if she will win.

sentences.cn: 低性欲的问题似乎在女性中比在男性中更加普遍.
sentences.en: Problems with low sexual desire appear to be more common among women than men.

sentences.cn: 他们似乎误解了我.
sentences.en: They appear to have misunderstood me.

sentences.cn: 在市场上推销这些产品似乎没有什么困难.
sentences.en: There appears to be no difficulty in marketing these products.

sentences.cn: 有些气体星云似乎被极其巨大的分子云完全包围.
sentences.en: Some nebulae appear to be completely engulfed by exceedingly large molecular clouds.

sentences.cn: 当时财政手段的弹药储备似乎相当充足.
sentences.en: Back then there appeared plenty of fiscal ammunition to spare.

sentences.cn: 但中国政府似乎正试图平息公众对事件的兴趣.
sentences.en: But the Chinese government also appears to trying to tamp down interest in the case.

sentences.cn: 金先生似乎并不担心.
sentences.en: Mr King appears unfazed.

sentences.cn: 正确. 一切似乎都运行得很完美,直到现在.
sentences.en: Correct. And everything appeared to be working perfectly until now.

sentences.cn: 但是谷歌的遭遇,似乎给雅虎的雄心壮志泼了些冷水.
sentences.en: But the experience of Google in particular appears to have chilled Yahoo's ambition.

sentences.cn: 中国的绿色承诺似乎正在退色.
sentences.en: China's commitment to greenness appears to be ebbing.

sentences.cn: 曼谷 、 河内和新加坡的一些店主似乎已欣然接受人民币付款.
sentences.en: Already, some shopkeepers in Bangkok, Hanoi and Singapore appear happy to accept renminbi as payment.

sentences.cn: 另外, 婚姻似乎可以减轻压抑.
sentences.en: In addition, marriage appeared to reduce the degree of depression.

sentences.cn: 重塑整个产业,似乎迫在眉睫.
sentences.en: A reshaping of the entire industry appeared to be imminent.

sentences.cn: 这一切似乎都在告诉我们,一个都市化的商业时代就在我们的身边.
sentences.en: Everything appears to tell us that an urbanized commercial age has already come.

sentences.cn: 分析家暗示, 电脑需求似乎逐渐趋缓.
sentences.en: Analyst suggestion, computer demand appears gradually hasten delay.

sentences.cn: 最后他似乎还是同意了大家的意见.
sentences.en: At last it appears that he came round to the general opinion.

sentences.cn: 剥离银行业务的想法似乎已经放弃了.
sentences.en: The idea of hiving off the banking operations appears to have been dropped.
